description: This test checks cnf pod antiaffinity rule in cnf deployment.

reelFirstStep.execute: oc get deployment {{.DEPLOYMENT_NAME}} -n {{.DEPLOYMENT_NAMESPACE}} -o json | jq -r ' if .spec.replicas > 1 then if .spec.template.spec.affinity.podAntiAffinity != null then "OK" else "MISSING" end else "OK" end '
